todos.title: Trust Your Gut
todos.body: Trust your gut and don’t be afraid to make hard decisions, do dirty work, cut losses, let others down.  Remember you owe people respect and that is it.

todos.title: Trust but Verify
todos.body: Trust peoples words but verify their actions.

todos.title: Follow the Law
todos.body: Structure deals with careful legal consideration and follow the documents, don’t simply trust people will do the right thing.  Read legal agreements before you act.  Seek legal advice early.

todos.title: Redundancies
todos.body: Have multiple checks and balances.  Two sets of eyes are better than one.

todos.title: Strategy Free
todos.body: Don’t overcommit to a certain method, industry, product, or way of dong something.

todos.title: Stay on Top of It
todos.body: Don’t expect that things will fix themselves.  Stop the bleeding.
